mapper.select: SELECT deposit_id FROM deposit WHERE use_flag=0 AND deposit_code IN (00501, 00502, 00505)
SELECT deposit_id AS depositId, discounted_rate AS discountedRate, deposit_code AS depositCode FROM deposit WHERE use_flag=0 AND deposit_code IN (00503, 00504)

SELECT deposit_duration_id AS duration, deposit_duration_id AS depositDurationId , sa_deposit_id AS saDepositId, over_interest AS overInterest, end_interest AS endInterest , cancel_interest AS cancelInterest FROM deposit_duration

SELECT da.account_id FROM deposit_account da JOIN deposit_duration dd ON da.deposit_duration_id = dd.deposit_duration_id JOIN deposit d ON dd.sa_deposit_id = d.deposit_id WHERE d.deposit_code = '00501' AND d.use_flag = 0
